node.name: Agile4R
node.shortdescription: Agile4R is a model-driven application generator for IBM Rational Software Modeler (RSM) and Rational Software Architect (RSA). Agile4R generates working JEE business applications from .emx UML models and xHTML GUI mock-ups. Generated applications are based on JSF/Spring/Hibernate frameworks, and can be deployed on IBM Websphere and Apache Tomcat application servers. A free trial is available here : www.agile4r.com
node.body: Agile4R is a model-driven application generator for IBM Rational Software Modeler (RSM) and Rational Software Architect (RSA). Agile4R generates working JEE business applications from .emx UML models and xHTML GUI mock-ups. Generated applications are based on JSF/Spring/Hibernate frameworks, and can be deployed on IBM Websphere and Apache Tomcat application servers. A free trial is available here : www.agile4r.com
